Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Admission to major, overall 2.5 GPA, 3.0 GPA in major, and C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: A cross-cultural field experience which includes cultural and language immersion. Theoretical and applied knowledge of culture and language. diversity.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Community Innovation and Education

FLE4340 - Teaching World Languages in K-.name: FLE4340 - Teaching World Languages in K-12 Schools

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: PR: Admission to Teacher Education B.S. World Languages Education track or Lifelong Learning track or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Methods of teaching another language at the K-12 level within a communicative framework. Includes examination and practice of current instructional techniques in listening, speaking, reading, writing skills, testing, and error correction.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Community Innovation and Education
